original.question: Are both Delmer Daves and Jean-Pierre Jeunet film directors?
original.context: Jean-Pierre Jeunet (] ; born 3 September 1953) is a French film director and screenwriter known for the films "Delicatessen", "The City of Lost Children", "" and "Amélie". Delmer Lawrence Daves (July 24, 1904 – August 17, 1977) was an American screenwriter, director and producer.
